doctitle.textblock: Realty Action: Lease or Sale of Public Lands for Recreation and Public Purpose, Pershing County, NV

summary.textblock: In response to an application from the Pershing County Fair and Recreation Board, the following described land is being considered for an eighteen hole championship golf course pursuant to the Recreation and Public Purpose Act as amended (43 U.S.C. 869,
Upon publication of this Notice in the

the above described lands will be segregated from all forms of appropriation under the public land laws, including the general mining laws, but not the Recreation and Public Purpose Act and the Mineral Leasing Laws.

When the required environmental, archaeological and mineral reports are completed and a determination is made that the lands are suitable for the use proposed, a subsequent Notice of Realty Action will be published in the
and appropriate newspapers classifying the lands for lease/conveyance. At that time, a 45 day public comment period will be provided.

further.textblock: Chuck Valentine, Bureau of Land Management, 705 E. Fourth Street, Winnemucca, Nevada 89445, (702) 623-1500.
